ygData.subject: Re: high level bard suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: I would like to take a moment to address that issue.  The message boards on EQ Vault for some reason have flamed FoH every step of the way.  They call them
ygData.messageBody:
I would like to take a moment to address that issue. The message boards on EQ
Vault for some reason have flamed FoH every step of the way. They call them
cheaters, exploiters, and worse. I have found this to not be the case. I have
come into contact with several FoH and, although they may be short tempered and
rude sometimes, this in no way precludes cheating, exploiting, or worse. They
are the highest level guild in the game because they are willing to give up
their external lives, if ones existed, and play EQ 18 hours a day. I am not
willing to make that sacrifice, are any of you? They earned their positions and
all the benefits that come from it, so it is unfair to flame them in fits of
jealousy, which is what those on EQVaults message boards do.
Penaden Songweaver
Vizier of Akalabeth
http://www.lostorder.com

"Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
> Perhaps the people on the other list wouldn't fill that way if they had been
> reading some of the posts on this list by JM and the other high level
> contributors:-).
>
> I did notice one of the posts was from a member of the Fires of Heaven guild
> (the guild who recently kiiled Lady Vox with/without the help of Aradune).
> I play on E'ci so have no idea how this guild operates and really don't
> care. However, if you believe some of the recent posts on EQVault, the
> Fires of Heaven guild consists primarily of powergamers. From all the great
> posts I have read on this list, the general consensus among us seems to
> indicate that playing a bard is not very suitable to the type of person who
> powergames. Perhaps that is why the poster felt that bards were useless.
> Pure speculation on my part.
>
> Galtin
> Bard and Master Brewer of E'ci
>
> <snip>
> >
> > Hi Crip Fireblade from FoH here...
> > lvl 49 bard on Veeshan
> >
> > My question or statement is really bards are totally screwed over at
> > high levels.
> > Not only do they have no chance of meleeing even a tenth as well as a
> > warrior, but there
> > are NO high level songs that are worthwhile.
> >
>
